verses.ar: وَٱلطُّورِ
verses.en: By the mount

verses.ar: وَكِتَٰبٖ مَّسۡطُورٖ
verses.en: And [by] a Book inscribed

verses.ar: فِي رَقّٖ مَّنشُورٖ
verses.en: In parchment spread open

verses.ar: وَٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡمَعۡمُورِ
verses.en: And [by] the frequented House

verses.ar: وَٱلسَّقۡفِ ٱلۡمَرۡفُوعِ
verses.en: And [by] the heaven raised high

verses.ar: وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ ٱلۡمَسۡجُورِ
verses.en: And [by] the sea filled [with fire]

verses.ar: إِنَّ عَذَابَ رَبِّكَ لَوَٰقِعٞ
verses.en: Indeed, the punishment of your Lord will occur

verses.ar: مَّا لَهُۥ مِن دَافِعٖ
verses.en: Of it there is no preventer

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ تَمُورُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ مَوۡرٗا
verses.en: On the Day the heaven will sway with circular motion

verses.ar: وَتَسِيرُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ سَيۡرٗا
verses.en: And the mountains will pass on, departing

verses.ar: فَوَيۡلٞ يَوۡمَئِذٖ لِّلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.en: Then woe, that Day, to the deniers

verses.ar: ٱلَّذِينَ هُمۡ فِي خَوۡضٖ يَلۡعَبُونَ
verses.en: Who are in [empty] discourse amusing themselves

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ يُدَعُّونَ إِلَىٰ نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ دَعًّا
verses.en: The Day they are thrust toward the fire of Hell with a [violent] thrust, [its angels will say]

verses.ar: هَٰذِهِ ٱلنَّارُ ٱلَّتِي كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.en: This is the Fire which you used to deny

verses.ar: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ
verses.en: Then is this magic, or do you not see

verses.ar: ٱصۡلَوۡهَا فَٱصۡبِرُوٓاْ أَوۡ لَا تَصۡبِرُواْ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡكُمۡۖ إِنَّمَا تُجۡزَوۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.en: [Enter to] burn therein; then be patient or impatient - it is all the same for you. You are only being recompensed [for] what you used to do

verses.ar: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ فِي جَنَّـٰتٖ وَنَعِيمٖ
verses.en: Indeed, the righteous will be in gardens and pleasure

verses.ar: فَٰكِهِينَ بِمَآ ءَاتَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ وَوَقَىٰهُمۡ رَبُّهُمۡ عَذَابَ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ
verses.en: Enjoying what their Lord has given them, and their Lord protected them from the punishment of Hellfire

verses.ar: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ
verses.en: [They will be told], "Eat and drink in satisfaction for what you used to do

verses.ar: مُتَّكِـِٔينَ عَلَىٰ سُرُرٖ مَّصۡفُوفَةٖۖ وَزَوَّجۡنَٰهُم بِحُورٍ عِينٖ
verses.en: They will be reclining on thrones lined up, and We will marry them to fair women with large, [beautiful] eyes

verses.ar: وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱتَّبَعَتۡهُمۡ ذُرِّيَّتُهُم بِإِيمَٰنٍ أَلۡحَقۡنَا بِهِمۡ ذُرِّيَّتَهُمۡ وَمَآ أَلَتۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ عَمَلِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖۚ كُلُّ ٱمۡرِيِٕۭ بِمَا كَسَبَ رَهِينٞ
verses.en: And those who believed and whose descendants followed them in faith - We will join with them their descendants, and We will not deprive them of anything of their deeds. Every person, for what he earned, is retained

verses.ar: وَأَمۡدَدۡنَٰهُم بِفَٰكِهَةٖ وَلَحۡمٖ مِّمَّا يَشۡتَهُونَ
verses.en: And We will provide them with fruit and meat from whatever they desire

verses.ar: يَتَنَٰزَعُونَ فِيهَا كَأۡسٗا لَّا لَغۡوٞ فِيهَا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمٞ
verses.en: They will exchange with one another a cup [of wine] wherein [results] no ill speech or commission of sin

verses.ar: ۞وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ غِلۡمَانٞ لَّهُمۡ كَأَنَّهُمۡ لُؤۡلُؤٞ مَّكۡنُونٞ
verses.en: There will circulate among them [servant] boys [especially] for them, as if they were pearls well-protected

verses.ar: وَأَقۡبَلَ بَعۡضُهُمۡ عَلَىٰ بَعۡضٖ يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
verses.en: And they will approach one another, inquiring of each other

verses.ar: قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا كُنَّا قَبۡلُ فِيٓ أَهۡلِنَا مُشۡفِقِينَ
verses.en: They will say, "Indeed, we were previously among our people fearful [of displeasing Allah]

verses.ar: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.en: So Allah conferred favor upon us and protected us from the punishment of the Scorching Fire

verses.ar: إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبۡلُ نَدۡعُوهُۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡبَرُّ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.en: Indeed, we used to supplicate Him before. Indeed, it is He who is the Beneficent, the Merciful

verses.ar: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
verses.en: So remind [O Muhammad], for you are not, by the favor of your Lord, a soothsayer or a madman

verses.ar: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ شَاعِرٞ نَّتَرَبَّصُ بِهِۦ رَيۡبَ ٱلۡمَنُونِ
verses.en: Or do they say [of you], "A poet for whom we await a misfortune of time

verses.ar: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ
verses.en: Say, "Wait, for indeed I am, with you, among the waiters

verses.ar: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ
verses.en: Or do their minds command them to [say] this, or are they a transgressing people

verses.ar: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ تَقَوَّلَهُۥۚ بَل لَّا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.en: Or do they say, "He has made it up"? Rather, they do not believe

verses.ar: فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِحَدِيثٖ مِّثۡلِهِۦٓ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ
verses.en: Then let them produce a statement like it, if they should be truthful

verses.ar: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ
verses.en: Or were they created by nothing, or were they the creators [of themselves]

verses.ar: أَمۡ خَلَقُواْ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَۚ بَل لَّا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.en: Or did they create the heavens and the earth? Rather, they are not certain

verses.ar: أَمۡ عِندَهُمۡ خَزَآئِنُ رَبِّكَ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُصَۜيۡطِرُونَ
verses.en: Or have they the depositories [containing the provision] of your Lord? Or are they the controllers [of them]

verses.ar: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ سُلَّمٞ يَسۡتَمِعُونَ فِيهِۖ فَلۡيَأۡتِ مُسۡتَمِعُهُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ
verses.en: Or have they a stairway [into the heaven] upon which they listen? Then let their listener produce a clear authority

verses.ar: أَمۡ لَهُ ٱلۡبَنَٰتُ وَلَكُمُ ٱلۡبَنُونَ
verses.en: Or has He daughters while you have sons

verses.ar: أَمۡ تَسۡـَٔلُهُمۡ أَجۡرٗا فَهُم مِّن مَّغۡرَمٖ مُّثۡقَلُونَ
verses.en: Or do you, [O Muhammad], ask of them a payment, so they are by debt burdened down

verses.ar: أَمۡ عِندَهُمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبُ فَهُمۡ يَكۡتُبُونَ
verses.en: Or have they [knowledge of] the unseen, so they write [it] down

verses.ar: أَمۡ يُرِيدُونَ كَيۡدٗاۖ فَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ هُمُ ٱلۡمَكِيدُونَ
verses.en: Or do they intend a plan? But those who disbelieve - they are the object of a plan

verses.ar: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ إِلَٰهٌ غَيۡرُ ٱللَّهِۚ سُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ
verses.en: Or have they a deity other than Allah? Exalted is Allah above whatever they associate with Him

verses.ar: وَإِن يَرَوۡاْ كِسۡفٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ سَاقِطٗا يَقُولُواْ سَحَابٞ مَّرۡكُومٞ
verses.en: And if they were to see a fragment from the sky falling, they would say, "[It is merely] clouds heaped up

verses.ar: فَذَرۡهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ يُلَٰقُواْ يَوۡمَهُمُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ يُصۡعَقُونَ
verses.en: So leave them until they meet their Day in which they will be struck insensible

verses.ar: يَوۡمَ لَا يُغۡنِي عَنۡهُمۡ كَيۡدُهُمۡ شَيۡـٔٗا وَلَا هُمۡ يُنصَرُونَ
verses.en: The Day their plan will not avail them at all, nor will they be helped

verses.ar: وَإِنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ عَذَابٗا دُونَ ذَٰلِكَ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.en: And indeed, for those who have wronged is a punishment before that, but most of them do not know

verses.ar: وَٱصۡبِرۡ لِحُكۡمِ رَبِّكَ فَإِنَّكَ بِأَعۡيُنِنَاۖ وَسَبِّحۡ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.en: And be patient, [O Muhammad], for the decision of your Lord, for indeed, you are in Our eyes. And exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord when you arise

verses.ar: وَمِنَ ٱلَّيۡلِ فَسَبِّحۡهُ وَإِدۡبَٰرَ ٱلنُّجُومِ
verses.en: And in a part of the night exalt Him and after [the setting of] the stars
